description: Another of the Albion`s pilot reinforcements, Bate is calmer and less obnoxious than Monsha, but can be relied upon to encourage his friend`s misbehaviour. Together with Monsha and Adel, he served under Burning during the One Year War, and his experience makes him a natural choice for deputy commander of the Albion`s mobile suit team.
name: Alpha A. Bate
